remarks: Foulis-Holland Theorem.  If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive.  First of two parts.  Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
fh1.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
fh1.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
fh1.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
fh1.4 $e |- A C_H B $.
fh1.5 $e |- A C_H C $.
fh1i $p |- ( A i^i ( B vH C ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) vH ( A i^i C ) ) $.
